ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] The Bardic Kiter
ygData.msgSnippet: It s obvious to everybody that Necros are so overpowered. As far as all-around solo capability nothing can beat a necro anywhere anyplace. Heck, I just read a
ygData.messageBody:
It's obvious to everybody that Necros are so overpowered. As far as
all-around solo capability nothing can beat a necro anywhere anyplace.

Heck, I just read a thread where a necro solo'd Estrella of Gloomwater in
KK. That's a summoning, healing mob, btw. Comparing bards to necros in
soloability is just silly. There's no comparison.

Another reason the chains nerf ticks me off.

> From: "Lyrnia Jongleur" <Lyrnia@...>
> Reply-To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Date: Sun, 27 Aug 2000 17:46:26 -0400
> To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] The Bardic Kiter
>
> Solo classes, in order of power:
> 1) Necro (yes, they beat even us)
> 2) Druid or Bard (I'd say bard then druid but it's hard to really say)
> 3) Magician
> 4) Dunno, does it matter beyond this? :)
